spell1.name: TRIDENT OF NEPTUNE
spell1.description: Throw the trident forward, reducing Aquatic Dominion's cooldown upon enemy impact. Critical hits cause Monstro Spawn to enter a berserk state, gaining increased Attack Speed.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Each hit charges Aquatic Dominion by 0.084

spell2.name: HORN OF PROTEUS
spell2.description: Summon Giganto to leap atop enemies within range, disabling their mobility abilities.

attributes.label: RANGE
attributes.value: A cylindrical spell field with an inner circle radius of 3.5m, an outer circle radius of 9m, and a height of 3m

spell3.name: BLESSING OF THE DEEP
spell3.description: Summon a protective barrier while flying upwards.

spell4.name: AQUATIC DOMINION
spell4.description: Summon a Monstro Spawn that can autonomously attack enemies.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Arced Trajectory (Summon Monstro Spawn) - Direct Hit (Monstro Spawn)

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 20m, decreasing to 50% at 40m

spell5.name: WRATH OF THE SEVEN SEAS
spell5.description: Launch the trident forward to damage nearby enemies, then direct all Monstro Spawn to perform an enhanced attack on the nearest hit enemy. When the trident hits an enemy, Monstro Spawn to enter a berserk state, gaining increased Attack Speed.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Arced projectile that generates a spell field upon impact
